messages.subject: Re: R: [samuraihistory] TACHI  and tai chi-Try Yabusame
messages.msgSnippet: Yes,  Yabusame does related to mounted archery.  An easy way to access information is to simply put  yabusame in your computer search engine.  The sport is
messages.messageBody:
Yes, Yabusame does related to mounted archery. An easy way to access
information is to simply put "yabusame'' in your computer search engine. The sport
is still kept alive today. When President Reagan visited Japan, Toshiro
Mifune, the famed Japanese actor, gave a demonstration of yabusame for the
president. Prof. Murphy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
